entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
